Gangeyya：1．Gangeyya.-Adjective formed from Ganga （J.ii.151）．The description ”Gangeyya nāgaraja” in J.iii.362 probably means a nāga king ”dwelling in Ganga” and not ”named Gangeyya.”



2．Gangeyya.-One of the ten families of elephants．Each elephant had the strength of one hundred men．MA.i.262； AA.ii.822； BuA.37.
